snippet: Gloria C. Mackenzie, 84, who bought her Powerball ticket after another customer let her get ahead in line came forward on Wednesday to claim the $590 million jackpot.
abstract: Gloria C Mackenzie, 84-year-old woman from Florida, comes forward to claim $590 million Powerball jackpot, becoming largest sole lottery winner in the history of American lotteries.
lead_paragraph: Gloria C. Mackenzie, 84, who bought her Powerball ticket after another customer let her get ahead in line came forward on Wednesday to claim the $590 million jackpot.

headline.main: Florida: Largest Sole Lottery Winner Got Ahead in Line and in Life
headline.print_headline: Florida: Largest Sole Lottery Winner Got Ahead In Line and In Life
